okk thnkyou.
Rookie question: Can you pass HubL variables into the CSS view when your editing a module?

not in a custom module. only 1 HubL tag is allowd in the CSS pane. The reason for this is if you had multiple instances of the module on a page, they would conflict if you could do that.

So instead use inline styles or a <style> element in your HubL+HTML pane for instance specific css

if you just need the hubl for generating the CSS and it’s not actually going to change based on module params you can create a css file and link it, CSS files support HubL, it is only fired on publish
